articles.title: 600 toilet paper rolls stolen amid shortage feas in Hong Kong
articles.description: Police in Hong Kong have arrested two men and are searching for a third after the group stole about 600 toilet paper rolls, in a robbery likely sparked by coronavirus fears that have gripped the city.

articles.title: How low can bond rates go?
articles.description: Giddy investors in stocks have shrugged off worries about the impact of the coronavirus outbreak on the global financial markets. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq both closed at new all-time highs Friday.
